summary: Suspending classes primary and secondary educational institutions, restrictions on public gatherings and visiting hospitals and long-term care facilities
Prohibiting public gatherings larger than 50 people are prohibited, restrictions on restaurants, bars and event venues, and closure of recreational and entertainment facilities.
Prohibiting public gatherings of more than 25 people, mandatory self-isolation, closure of venues, clinics and personal service facilities.
Restricting indoor and outdoor public gatherings and private gatherings of over 10 people.
Regarding staff working in special-care and personal care homes, and screening and personal protective equipment measures for staff in hospitals, special-care, personal care and affiliate care homes.
Restricting all non-critical travel into and out of northern Saskatchewan, specifically the Northern Saskatchewan Administration District.

travel: NSAD + prohibited travel outside of NSAD community-E
summary: The Chief Medical Health Officer of Saskatchewan has issued a Public Health Order restricting travel in northern Saskatchewan.
